word: If you do not examine yourself searchingly in the light reflected from the cross of Christ revealed in His Word, self-love will prompt you to have a much better opinion of yourself than is either just, true, or safe. "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked" (Jeremiah 17:9). "He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool" (Proverbs 28:26). And yet we are naturally inclined to this trust in the goodness of our desperately wicked hearts.
